about_the_game:
Mathel Idle is a new Free idle game with Match3 system which replaces the normal clicking aspect of idle games. Either match the orbs yourself to increase your chance of dealing higher damage to the monster or press the idle button and make the AI automatically control the orbs for you.



Mathel Idle Features:


-Match3: Tired of the clicking part of idle games? Worry no more with the new Match3 system.

-Map System: Each level is different with the new random maps system.

-Scrolls and Equipment: Loot different rarities of scrolls to make your character more powerful or acquire various equipment types to increase your character stats.

-Gems: Bad loot dropped? Use Gems on them to modify their rarity and stats to new values.

-Endgame: Explore the building feature where you loot different materials and recruit workers to build your own village which impact the way you play Mathel.
